categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Twin Suns Seven was the callsign of one of the Twin Suns Fighter Squadron pilots during the the Battle of Ebaq 9. When he along with the rest of Twin Suns Squadron tried to hide in the underground tunnels of Ebaq 9, he was injured by an attacking Voxyn that was hunting Jaina Solo. Even though he suffered brutal injuries, he survived the conflict and the rest of the battle and was eventually rescued from the tunnels by the New Republic fleet.
The pilot's name was not mentioned in the book Destiny's Way, and was only briefly used during the fight with the Voxyn.
